thread.title: US-China Cooperation on Climate Change: Don't Forget Waste-to-Energy Technologies
thread.title_full: US-China Cooperation on Climate Change: Don't Forget Waste-to-Energy Technologies

title: US-China Cooperation on Climate Change: Don't Forget Waste-to-Energy Technologies
text:
28 US-China Cooperation on Climate Change: Don't Forget Waste-to-Energy Technologies 
Renewable Energy World: If the September 25, 2015 meetings in Washington between President Obama and President Xi of China yield no additional, substantive agreements to ease the tensions between the two countries in the arenas of monetary policy, currency devaluation, cyber-warfare or China's military build up in the Southeast Asian theater, they will be noted in the annals of environmental history for having yielded a historic, landmark commitment by China to start a national program in 2017 that will limit and put a price on greenhouse gas emissions.
